verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees. <S%H4609><s%> They that trust <S%H982><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be as mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> which cannot <S%H3808><s%> be removed, <S%H4131><s%> but stays <S%H3427><s%> for ever. <S%H5769><s%>

As the mountains <S%H2022><s%> are round <S%H5439><s%> about Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> so the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is round <S%H5439><s%> about his people <S%H5971><s%> from now on <S%H6258><s%> even for ever. <S%H5769><s%>

For the rod <S%H7626><s%> of the wicked <S%H7562><s%> shall not rest <S%H5117><s%> on the lot <S%H1486><s%> of the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> lest <S%H4616><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> put <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> to iniquity. <S%H5766><s%>
Do good, <S%H2895><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to those that be good, <S%H2896><s%> and to them that are upright <S%H3477><s%> in their hearts. <S%H3826><s%>

As for such as turn <S%H5186><s%> aside <S%H5186><s%> to their crooked <S%H6128><s%> ways, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall lead <S%H3212><s%> them forth with the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity: <S%H205><s%> but peace <S%H7965><s%> shall be on Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
